attributes.name: audio-only
attributes.description: Is the media an audio file only?

attributes.name: accent-color
attributes.description:
Optional accent color for controls,
using the following materialize "colors":
red, pink, purple, deep-purple, indigo, blue,
light blue, cyan, teal, green, light green, lime,
yellow, amber, orange, deep-orange, and brown.
Default is null.

attributes.name: crossorigin
attributes.description: Cross origin flag for transcripts to load

attributes.name: dark
attributes.description: Enables darker player.

attributes.name: dark-transcript
attributes.description: Use dark theme on transcript? Default is false, even when player is dark.

attributes.name: disable-interactive
attributes.description: disable interactive mode that makes the transcript clickable

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: The height of the media player for non-a11y-media.

attributes.name: hide-timestamps
attributes.description: show cue's start and end time

attributes.name: hide-transcript
attributes.description: hide the transcript by default

attributes.name: iframed
attributes.description: Computed if this should be in an iframe or not.

attributes.name: is-a11y-media
attributes.description: Computed if this should be in a11y-media-player.

attributes.name: is-youtube
attributes.description: The type of source, i.e. "local", "vimeo", "youtube", etc.

attributes.name: lang
attributes.description: The language of the media

attributes.name: linkable
attributes.description: Include a share link?

attributes.name: media-title
attributes.description: Simple caption for the video

attributes.name: player-id
attributes.description:
ID for a11y-media-player. 
If none specified it will be modified from schema-resource-id.

attributes.name: preload
attributes.description: What to preload for a11y-media-player: auto, metadata (default), or none.

attributes.name: sandboxed
attributes.description: Compute if this is a sandboxed system or not

attributes.name: source
attributes.description: Source of the video

attributes.name: sources
attributes.description: Source of the video

attributes.name: source-data
attributes.description: List of source objects

attributes.name: source-type
attributes.description: The type of source, i.e. "local", "vimeo", "youtube", etc.

attributes.name: sticky-corner
attributes.description:
When playing but scrolled off screen, to which corner does it "stick":
top-left, top-right, bottom-left, bottom-right, or none?
Default is "top-right". "None" disables stickiness.

attributes.name: track
attributes.description: The url for a single subtitle track

attributes.name: tracks
attributes.description:
Array of text tracks
[{
  "src": "path/to/track.vtt",
  "label": "English",
  "srclang": "en",
  "kind": "subtitles",
}]

attributes.name: track-data
attributes.description:
Cleaned array of text tracks
[{
  "src": "path/to/track.vtt",
  "label": "English",
  "srclang": "en",
  "kind": "subtitles",
}]

attributes.name: thumbnail-src
attributes.description: Source of optional thumbnail image

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: The width of the media player for non-a11y-media.

attributes.name: youtube-id
attributes.description: The type of source, i.e. "local", "vimeo", "youtube", etc.
